applet_name: Take on the 1p Savings Challenge
applet_description:
Gradually increase the amount you're saving each day to a pot of your choice. On 1st January, you'll save 1p. On 2nd January, you'll save 2p. This goes right up to ¬£3.65 (or ¬£3.66 üòÅ) on the last day of the year!

Feel free to jump in part way through the year, and see how far you get!

The challenge resets automatically on January 1st every year.

applet_name: Take on the Reverse 1p Savings Challenge
applet_description:
A savings challenge that gets easier every day!

Gradually decrease the amount you're saving each day to a pot of your choice. On 1st January, you'll save ¬£3.65. On 2nd January, you'll save ¬£3.64. This goes right down to ¬£0.01 on the last day of the year! Feel free to jump in part way through the year, and see how far you get!

applet_name: Hive Landlord Control to return to Schedule at 15 minutes past the hour.
applet_description:
Hive Landlord Control to return to Schedule at 15 minutes past the hour. If your tenants change the temperature up and down it will return to your schedule. Alternatively, a friendlier way to give your tenants the benefit of the doubt is set up 2 for every 30 minutes or 1 for every hour. 
For multiple houses set up an individual ifttt login to match your Hive email addresses.
Beware: savvy tenants can change the schedule from the stat - so check online periodically to check it is your schedule.

applet_name: Time controlled on/off ewelink
applet_description: Turn on ewelink wall plug at set time.

applet_name: Save the Date
applet_description: A savings challenge that takes today's date, adds up the numbers, and saves the total in a Pot. For example, 24th May 2019 would be 24 + 5 + 19 = 48p. This will move the money into your Pot at 8am every day.

applet_name: If [time] change ezviz alarm notification
